name: I am Dogs(s)
description:
[15 minute read]

Imagine one day that you suddenly have a realization that changes how you perceive yourself. That it retroactively contextualizes your past, and makes you utterly change how you see yourself. That realization is, that you are a dog.

I am Dog(s) is a semi-autobiographical narrative about a freshly cracked trans woman struggling with multiple discoveries she makes about herself one right after another.

---

This game was inspired by LOVE, STARGIRL's Ramiel
